name: Elite Dangerous: Odyssey
description:
Elite Dangerous: Odyssey is an action-simulation massively multiplayer game developed by Frontier Developments. It came out on 19-05-2021. Frontier Developments published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Elite Dangerous: Odyssey on PC. You can purchase the game on Epic Games Store and Steam.
It was produced by Michael Brookes. It was directed by David Braben. It was scored by Erasmus Talbot.
